languages.text: Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} Экклезиархии прекратить преследования малых культов, и гонения были остановлены.
The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец приказал{mf||а} Экклезиархии прекратить преследования малых культов, и гонения были остановлены.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, and their persecution was stopped.
The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, and their persecution was stopped.
The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné à l'Ecclésiarchie de cesser ses attaques contre les cultes mineurs de Dargonus, ce qui a mis fin à leur persécution.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné à l'Ecclésiarchie de cesser ses attaques contre les cultes mineurs de Dargonus, ce qui a mis fin à leur persécution.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は、ダルゴナスの小さな魔女団への攻撃を中止し、迫害を停止するよう帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）に命じた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は、ダルゴナスの小さな魔女団への攻撃を中止し、迫害を停止するよう帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）に命じた。

languages.text: 行商浪人禁止国教继续攻击、迫害达戈努斯的小型教派。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人禁止国教继续攻击、迫害达戈努斯的小型教派。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó a la Eclesiarquía que cesara sus ataques contra los cultos menores de Dargonus deteniendo su persecución.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó a la Eclesiarquía que cesara sus ataques contra los cultos menores de Dargonus deteniendo su persecución.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat der Ekklesiarchie befohlen, ihre Angriffe auf die kleinen Kulte von Dargonus einzustellen und deren Verfolgung zu beenden.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat der Ekklesiarchie befohlen, ihre Angriffe auf die kleinen Kulte von Dargonus einzustellen und deren Verfolgung zu beenden.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Ekleşiarşi'ye Dargonus'un küçük tarikatlarına ilişmemelerini emrederek onlara yönelik saldırı ve zulmü durdurdu.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader commanded the Ecclesiarchy to cease their attacks on the minor cults of Dargonus, halting their persecution.
